question.title: What is the primary indication for prescribing anticonvulsant treatment in adults?
question.description: Anticonvulsant treatment is used for which medical condition in adults?

option_a.title: Epilepsy
option_a.description: A neurological disorder characterized by recurrent seizures

option_c.title: Anxiety disorders
option_c.description: A mental health condition characterized by feelings of anxiety

option_d.title: Hypertension
option_d.description: A medical condition characterized by high blood pressure
